/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of red and white, add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement in this part of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
